seo.faq.question1: How does WhatsApp number verification work?
seo.faq.answer1: Our platform checks if a phone number is registered and active on WhatsApp by analyzing various signals and data points. We provide real-time verification status and profile information when available.
seo.faq.question2: Is it legal to search WhatsApp numbers?
seo.faq.answer2: Yes, searching publicly available phone numbers is legal. We only provide information that is already accessible through public channels and comply with all applicable privacy laws and regulations.
seo.faq.question3: Can I use this for marketing purposes?
seo.faq.answer3: Yes, our database includes numbers that can be used for legitimate marketing purposes. However, you must comply with local spam and privacy laws, including obtaining proper consent before contacting individuals.
seo.faq.answer4: Our verification system has a high accuracy rate of over 95%. However, WhatsApp status can change frequently, so we recommend verifying critical numbers in real-time.
seo.faq.question5: Do you store the numbers I search?
seo.faq.answer5: Yes, searched numbers are stored in our database to improve our service and provide marketing insights. All data is handled according to our privacy policy and applicable data protection laws.
